description: recto: seated nude male figure with legs apart; PR knee higher than PL knee; arms out, with hands not differentiated; head bent slightly downward; torso well differentiated; verso: arm holding staff and line indicating side of body
medium: Black and white chalk on brown prepared paper
provenance: Sale, Sotheby's, London, May 29, 1975, part of no. 206, for £110 to Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1975-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Seated Male Nude
